subject: Sales IM Assembly Contest: $13,500 in prizes
body:
Hello sm1lies,

The Sales IM Tool assembly competition has been reposted with new deadlines and milestones deliverables.  Check out the details on this competition at: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ViewAssemblyActiveContests.

In addition to the prize money, this contest can earn you valuable placement points -- and a share of the $90,000 prize pool -- in the new Digital Run Assembly Cup. Learn more: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=Static&d1=digital_run&d2=description

Good luck!


- The TopCoder Software Team

===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of new TopCoder development opportunities. If you no longer wish to receive these emails, login to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'. In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails. Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.
